events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 28, resulting in front bumper damage and minor injuries.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the case and communicate with the customer and repair center.
Customer received formal acknowledgment of their claim submission along with an estimated timeline for resolution.
Additional documents including the police report, accident photos, and repair estimates were requested from the customer.
Customer submitted all requested documents promptly, including detailed repair shop estimates and medical reports.
The investigation team commenced a detailed review of the accident circumstances and involved parties.
Investigation completed confirming the details provided, verifying fault, and confirming repair costs required.
A settlement offer was issued covering the repair costs and medical expenses related to the accident.
Customer provided positive feedback appreciating the timely communication and fair settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved after verifying all documents and settlement terms were accepted.
Payment was issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover all eligible damages and losses as per the settlement.
The claim was officially closed with confirmation that the customer was satisfied with the resolution.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived securely for future reference and audit purposes.
